price: Anaasε wͻn wͻ atwedeε (a wͻde foro kͻ soro) kotie (Soro abͻfoͻ no, ne deε εrekͻso wͻhͻ)? Ɛneε wͻn atiefoͻ no mfa wͻn nyinasoͻ pefee mmra.
arabic: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ سُلَّمٞ يَسۡتَمِعُونَ فِيهِۖ فَلۡيَأۡتِ مُسۡتَمِعُهُم بِسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٍ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: am lahum sullamun yastamiʿūna fīhi falyati mus'tamiʿuhum bisul'ṭānin mubīnin
